content:
TITLE: Setting Up Environment Variables
DESCRIPTION: Command to copy the example environment file to create a new .env file which will hold configuration variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cp .env.example .env
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Python Package Dependencies for Plaid Quickstart
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the exact versions of Python packages required for the Plaid Quickstart project. It ensures compatibility and consistent behavior across different environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/python/requirements.txt#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
Flask==3.0.0
plaid_python==28.0.0
python-dotenv==0.15.0
itsdangerous==2.1.2
werkzeug==3.1.3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Plaid Quickstart Repository with HTTPS
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Plaid quickstart repository using HTTPS and navigate to the project directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/plaid/quickstart
cd quickstart
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Plaid Quickstart Repository with SSH
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Plaid quickstart repository using SSH and navigate to the project directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone git@github.com:plaid/quickstart.git
cd quickstart
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the React Frontend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the React frontend for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ./frontend
npm ci
npm start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Node.js Backend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Node.js backend for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ cd ./node
$ npm install
$ ./start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Python Backend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Python backend for the Plaid quickstart application, including optional virtual environment setup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ./python

# If you use virtualenv
# virtualenv venv
# source venv/bin/activate

pip3 install -r requirements.txt
./start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Ruby Backend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Ruby backend for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ./ruby
bundle
./start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Go Backend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Go backend for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ./go
go build
./start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Java Backend
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the Java backend for the Plaid quickstart application using Maven.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ./java
mvn clean package
./start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Self-Signed Certificates for Localhost
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install mkcert's root CA and generate a self-signed certificate for localhost, creating certificate and key files in the frontend folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkcert -install
mkcert localhost
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Modified React Start Script for HTTPS
DESCRIPTION: The updated start script for package.json that enables HTTPS using the generated certificate and key files for the React development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
"start": "HTTPS=true SSL_CRT_FILE=localhost.pem SSL_KEY_FILE=localhost-key.pem react-scripts start",
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Docker Container for Quickstart
DESCRIPTION: Command to build and start a Docker container for the Plaid quickstart application, specifying the backend language.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make up language=node
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning with Symbolic Links on Windows
DESCRIPTION: Special command for Windows users to clone the repository with symbolic links enabled, which is necessary for the project to function correctly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone -c core.symlinks=true https://github.com/plaid/quickstart
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fixing Python SSL Certificate Error
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install SSL certificates for Python if encountering certificate verification failures.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# examples:
open /Applications/Python\ 3.9/Install\ Certificates.command
# or
open /Applications/Python\ 3.6/Install\ Certificates.command
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing mkcert Tool via Homebrew
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the mkcert tool using Homebrew, which will be used to generate self-signed certificates for HTTPS testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
brew install mkcert
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changing Directory to Frontend Folder for OAuth Setup
DESCRIPTION: Command to navigate to the frontend directory where the OAuth certificates will be created and configured.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd frontend
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Original React Start Script
DESCRIPTION: The default start script in package.json for the React frontend that needs to be replaced to enable HTTPS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
"start": "react-scripts start",
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Viewing Docker Container Logs
DESCRIPTION: Command to view logs from a running Docker container for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make logs language=node
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Stopping Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to stop a running Docker container for the Plaid quickstart application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make stop language=node
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Python SSL Certificate Error Message
DESCRIPTION: Error message that may appear when running the Python backend if SSL certificates are not properly installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/plaid/quickstart/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
ssl.SSLError: [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed (_ssl.c:749)
```
